No. 264582)} Sub: Simplified Procedure for Re-imbursement of Internet/ Phone Rental Call Charges under Special Campaign 4.0, Para 3(j) of MoRTAH OM No. CD-13012/01/2024- Coord dated 11.09.2024 reg: Reference Clause A and D of Policy Circular No.1.2.3.8 dated 01.02.2024 (Annexure-I). 2 The Procedure for Re-imbursement of Internet/ Phone Rental Call Charges by the Officials of NHAI has been simplified under Special Campaign 4.0, para 3(j) of MoRTGH OM No. CD-13012/01/2024-Coord dated 11.09.2024 (Annexure-II) is as follows: (a) The Reimbursement of Cost of Internet/ Phone Rental Call Charges/ Other Communication System shall be claimed by the Officials of NHAI on Quarterly / Half-Yearly / Annually basis on SAP likewise the Procedure for Reimbursement of One month Basic for OPD treatment without Production of Bills/ Cash Memos as per the Annual Maximum Ceiling Limit (in Rs.) as tabulated below: Maximum Ceiling Limit (in Rs.) Sl: No. Level as per CPC (through SAP) (a) (b Level-14 and above 60,000 2 Level-13 60,000 3 Level-12 000 4 Level-11 21,000 5 Level-10 12,000 6 Level-8 000 Level-786 12,000 8 Level-584 12,000 Level-3 & below 12,000 (b) This shall be effective for the current Financial Year, i.e. 2024-2025 and onwards till further Policy Circular in this regard.
